sense.gloss: to pull, to tug, to lead (e.g. a horse)
to draw (attention, sympathy, etc.), to attract (e.g. interest)
to draw back (e.g. one's hand), to draw in (one's chin, stomach, etc.), to pull in
to draw (a card, mahjong tile, etc.)
to play (a stringed or keyboard instrument)
to look up (in a dictionary, phone book, etc.), to consult, to check
to recede, to ebb, to fade
to be descend from, to inherit (a characteristic)
to quote, to cite, to raise (as evidence)
to lay on (electricity, gas, etc.), to install (e.g. a telephone), to supply (e.g. water)
to apply (e.g. lipstick), to oil (e.g. a pan), to wax (e.g. a floor)
to move back, to draw back, to recede
to lessen, to subside, to ebb, to go down (e.g. of swelling)
to resign, to retire, to quit

sdata.j: でも↑可能↑↓かのう↓↑性↑↓せい↓は↑低↑↓|ひく|↓そうだね。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓はピアノを↑上手↑↓じょうず↓に↑弾↑↓|ひ↓く|。
sdata.e: He plays the piano very well.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はピアノをとても↑上手↑↓じょうず↓に↑弾↑↓|ひ↓く|。
sdata.e: He plays the piano very well.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はたいへん↑上手↑↓じょうず↓にピアノを↑弾↑↓|ひ↓く|。
sdata.e: He plays the piano very well.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑辞書↑↓じしょ↓を↑引↑↓|ひ↓く|↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓をつけるべきだ。
sdata.e: You should try to form the habit of using your dictionaries.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑興味↑↓きょうみ↓を|ひく|↑本↑↓ほん↓なら↑何↑↓なに↓でも↑読↑↓よ↓んでいいよ。
sdata.e: You can read any book that interests you.

sdata.j: ↑教師↑↓きょうし↓の↑給料↑↓きゅうりょう↓は↑弁護士↑↓べんごし↓よりも↑低↑↓|ひく|↓い。
sdata.e: The salary of a teacher is lower than that of a lawyer.

sdata.j: ↑給料↑↓きゅうりょう↓が↑低↑↓|ひく|↓いので↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑暮↑↓く↓らし↑向↑↓む↓きがよくならない。
sdata.e: He is not better off because he is poorly paid.

sdata.j: ↑丘↑↓おか↓には↑低↑↓|ひく|↓い↑木↑↓き↓がたくさん↑茂↑↓しげ↓っている。
sdata.e: Lots of low trees grow on the hill.
